fields.name: roadway
fields.title: ROADWAY
fields.description: A unique 8-character identification number assigned to a roadway or section of a roadway either On or Off the State Highway System for which information is maintained in the Department's Roadway Characteristics Inventory (RCI).

fields.name: road_side
fields.title: ROAD_SIDE
fields.description: Side of the road. C = Composite; L = Left side; R = Right side

fields.name: lncd
fields.title: LNCD
fields.description: Codes 0 = UNDESIGNATED; 1 = DESIGNATED; 2 = BUFFERED; 3 = COLORED; 4 = BOTH 2 AND 3; 5 = SHARROW

fields.name: begin_post
fields.title: BEGIN_POST
fields.description: Denotes the lowest milepoint for the record.

fields.name: end_post
fields.title: END_POST
fields.description: Denotes the highest milepoint for the record.
